We traveled to Brazil, where we met Rodrigo, a man of many passions. Follow us on Instagram to see his story. #DoMore Rodrigo Rodrigues | Rocker, Restaurateur, Writer The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

We traveled to Peru, where we met Ana, a young woman whose organization is #empowering girls through a mix of education and mentorship. Follow us on Instagram for more of her story. #DoMore Ana Dodson | Founder, Peruvian Hearts The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

When our global Instagram adventure took us to Lima, we caught up with Tony, whose coffee trucks are making a difference. #DoMore Antonio Tang | Mobile Barista The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

Our Instagram global adventure found a moment of zen in the middle of New York City. Find out how Gisele is changing the world, one small step at a time. #DoMore Gisele Agnew | Yoga Instructor, Organic Candlemaker The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

We thought we knew how to brush our teeth. That is, until we met two guys named Mike on our Instagram tour. #DoMore Michael Davidson & Michael Smith | Toothbrush Innovators The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

Our Instagram world tour made a stop in Los Angeles, where we met modern-day Renaissance man Sal Masekela. Find out what drives him to #DoMore. Sal Masekela | Commentator, Musician, Filmmaker The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

Our Instagram adventures reached new heights when we met Tyler, an 11-year-old mountaineer who climbs for a cause. #DoMore Tyler Armstrong | World Record-Holding Mountain Climber The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

While on our international Instagram adventure, we met Rich, Mad Men’s Harry Crane and a gamer of a different kind. #DoMore Rich Sommer | Actor, Board Game Fanatic The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

Our international Instagram adventure took us to Bristol, England, where we found Kathy. Her thought-provoking art combines elements of nature and technology. #DoMore Kathy Hinde | Mixed Media Artist The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

Julia’s 9-to-5 in the London PR world gives her lots of material for her #5to9 as a comedian. #DoMore. Julia Streets | PR Consultant, Comedian The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

Our global adventure took us to Paris, where we met Juliette. She’s helping women everywhere feel better and look better at the same time. #DoMore Juliette de Feraudy | Lawyer, Hosiery Designer The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

On our global Instagram tour of people who #DoMore, we met Whitney, a Microsoft employee in France. She chronicles her life in Paris, one photo at a time, every single day. Whitney Cubbison | Unique Perspectives on Paris The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

Lorenzo made a difference in his hometown by fighting youth unemployment and litter with one ingenious program. See how he and others #DoMore: http://msft.it/6184xrd8 Lorenzo Dente | Environmentalist, Entrepreneur The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

Loretta helped bring her family's 200-year-old Italian farm into the 21st century. #DoMore Loretta di Simone | Organic Farmer, Innovator The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

Siew Te Wong founded the Bornean Sun Bear Conservation Centre in Malaysia to help protect the endangered species.

Follow us on Instagram to see more of his story and meet others who #DoMore every day: http://msft.it/6184aN6K Siew Te Wong | Biologist & Sun Bear Expert The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

Australians Jarrel and Jennifer created a Windows Phone app that detects the risk of anemia with a selfie. 

Follow us on Instagram to learn more about them and others who #DoMore every day: http://msft.it/6189ayuL Jarrel Seah & Jennifer Tang | Medical Students, App Creators The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

Four friends, four backgrounds, one shared interest: fashion. 

Follow us on Instagram to learn more about FOUREYES and other people who #DoMore daily: http://msft.it/6188vQIA FOUREYES | Friends, Fashion Bloggers The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

We got deep with Riley, a shark advocate in New Zealand. 

Follow us on Instagram to learn more about him and other people who #DoMore daily: http://msft.it/6189vkSV Riley Elliot | Marine Scientist, Shark Man The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

Dennis founded Garden Pool to help people #DoMore when it comes to sustainable food production.

Follow us on Instagram to see his story: http://msft.it/6183QAbT Dennis McClung: Founder, Garden Pool The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

#BehindTheScenes of our Instagram shoot in #LosAngeles: You can’t dream if you don’t sleep. #DoMore #WPPhoto #ShotOnMyLumia 

Follow our adventures on Instagram: http://msft.it/6188QSk6 Behind the Scenes: From Snapping to Napping The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

We’re searching for people who #DoMore daily, like interior designer, blogger, and author Justina. Follow us on Instagram to learn more about her and meet other inspiring people: http://msft.it/6182QVIC Justina Blakeney: Designer, Blogger, Author The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

On our global adventure to find people who #DoMore, we met acclaimed graffiti artist Allison Hueman. 

Follow us on Instagram to hear her story and meet more people like her: http://msft.it/6184Q67y Allison Hueman: Graphic Designed turned Graffiti Artist The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

#BehindTheScenes: We always make room for adventure. Next stop: #LosAngeles. #DoMore #WPPhoto #ShotOnMyLumia 

Join in by following us on Instagram: http://msft.it/6186tfAg Behind the scenes: LA-Bound The official Instagram account of Microsoft. Celebrating people who break boundaries, achieve their goals, and #DoMore every day.

Trivia Tuesday: Who is featured on the cover of Madden NFL 13, out today for Xbox 360? Timeline Photos
Trivia Tuesday Answer: Halo: Combat Evolved launched the same day as the original Xbox in 2001. Halo 4 comes out this November 6. Like if you'll be lining up to get it! Timeline Photos

Trivia Tuesday Answer: Windows desktop customization first appeared in Windows 3.0, released in 1990. Brightly colored geometric patterns were all the rage back then :-). Is your desktop background looking a little dated? Download some new ones here: http://bit.ly/PRE2X4 Timeline Photos
Trivia Tuesday Answer: Microsoft Office 1.0 for Windows was released in 1990. And boy, how times have changed! Download the new Office Customer Preview here: http://bit.ly/SD60dw Timeline Photos

Trivia Tuesday Answer: The ThinkPad line, now made by Lenovo, was introduced 20 years ago. The original ThinkPad 700C boasted 256 colors and a weight of "only" 7.6 pounds! Have you owned a ThinkPad? Timeline Photos

Trivia Tuesday Answer: Microsoft’s first CD-ROM application was Microsoft Bookshelf. It contained 10 complete reference books including The World Almanac and Book of Facts, The American Heritage Dictionary and The Chicago Manual of Style all on a single disc! Timeline Photos
Trivia Tuesday Answer: Microsoft was founded in 1975. Explore more Microsoft milestones in the timeline section of our Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/Microsoft Timeline Photos
Trivia Tuesday Answer: It's Microsoft Office - like this post if you've got an Office app open right now! http://on.fb.me/LNEVTy Timeline Photos
Trivia Tuesday: Name this Microsoft product: Timeline Photos

Trivia Tuesday Answer: An epic new Halo 4 adventure is coming to Xbox on November 6! The Nokia Lumia 920 and Lumia 820 with Windows Phone 8 will be available Friday on AT&T. Preorders start TODAY. Details here: http://bit.ly/YZtnkC Timeline Photos
The Lumia 920 will feature a 4.5” PureMotion HD+ display as well as an integrated Qi battery so users can charge wirelessly. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/PIGbGs Nokia Lumia 920 and 820
The Lumia 820 will feature a 4.3” OLED Wide Video Graphics Array (WVGA) display and a 1.5 GHz Dual Core Snapdragon processor. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/PIGbGs Nokia Lumia 920 and 820

The Lumia 820 will be available in black, white, red, yellow, purple, cyan, and grey. Both it and the Lumia 920 will come with Nokia City Lens (Augmented Reality using the phone’s camera viewfinder), Nokia Music (to stream unlimited music for free), Internet Explorer 10 and Nokia Drive (free turn-by-turn voice-guided navigation). Learn more here: http://bit.ly/PIGbGs Nokia Lumia 920 and 820
Nokia introduces the Lumia 920 and the Lumia 820, its first phones that will use the new Windows Phone 8 operating system.  Learn more here: http://bit.ly/PIGbGs Nokia Lumia 920 and 820

The Lumia 920 will come in yellow, red, white, grey, and black. It offers Nokia PureView, which makes it possible take high quality photos and videos at home, in restaurants, and even at night. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/PIGbGs Nokia Lumia 920 and 820
